original: Johansson, Ernst Gustaf Ludvig, kyrkoherde. Horred, f. 22/3/00 i Ljungby, Hall. I, av Johan J. o. Lina Kristina Johansson. G. 32 m. Ruth Béen. Barn: Sture £. 33. — Stud:ex. i Lund 26, teol. fil. ex. 27, teol. kand. 28, prästv. f. Gbgs stift 29. Tjg. s. v. pastor i Harplinge o. Sätila, kommin. i Lur 32, i Fjärås 37, kyrkoh. i Horred sed. 41.
translated: Johansson, Ernst Gustaf Ludvig, parish priest. Horred, born 22/3/00 in Ljungby, Halland. Son of Johan J. and Lina Kristina Johansson. Married in 1932 to Ruth Béen. Children: Sture born in 1933. He obtained his Bachelor's degree in Lund in 1926, his Master's in theology in 1927 and became an ordained priest for the Gothenburg diocese in 1929. He served as an assistant pastor in Harplinge and Sätila, a curate in Lur in 1932, in Fjärås in 1937, and as a parish priest in Horred from 1941 onwards.
